mapper.select: SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_UC_distribution_expcat ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId}, p_BPORGRegionID => #{bgOrgRegionId}, p_BPDivisionGroupDK => #{directionId} ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt, bpcalctype_name as calcType FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_UC_dyn ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId}, p_BPORGRegionID => #{bgOrgRegionId}, p_BPDivisionGroupDK => #{directionId}, p_type => 1 ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_UC_distribution ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId}, p_BPORGRegionID => #{bgOrgRegionId}, p_BPDivisionGroupDK => #{directionId} ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_UC_distribution_fot ( p_DateFrom => #{endDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => 6, p_BPORGRegionID => #{bgOrgRegionId}, p_BPDivisionGroupDK => #{directionId} ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_UC_dyn ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_BPORGRegionID => #{bgOrgRegionId}, p_BPDivisionGroupDK => #{directionId}, p_BPInnerEndProductDK => #{innerEndProductId}, p_type => 2 ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt, topByField FROM TABLE (pkg_unitcost_api.get_UC_data_topN ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId}, p_TopCount => 20, p_DirectionIDs => #{directionIds} ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt FROM TABLE (pkg_unitcost_api.get_UC_data_by_block ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId} ))

SELECT value_day as calcDate, grptype_value_uk as groupId, grptype_value_ccode as groupCode, grptype_value_name as groupName, bpinnerendproduct_dk as innerEndProductId, bpinnerendproduct_ccode as innerEndProductCode, bpinnerendproduct_name as innerEndProductName, totalsum_rur_amt as totalRurSum, totalsum_usd_amt as totalUsdSum, indexchangeprevmon_factor as indexChangeFactor, unitcostsum_rur_amt as unitCostRurSum, unitcostsum_usd_amt as unitCostUsdSum, totallaborvalue_cnt as totalLaborValueCnt, unitcostsum_rur_amt_cumulative as unitCostRurSumCumulative, unitcostsum_usd_amt_cumulative as unitCostUsdSumCumulative, quantity_cnt as quantityCnt FROM TABLE (pkg_unitcost_api.get_UC_data_grouped ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId} ))

SELECT DIRECTION_NAME as directionName, PRDTYPE_NAME as calcType, VALUE_DAY as calcDate, BPINNERENDPRODUCT_CCODE as innerEndProductCode, BPINNERENDPRODUCT_NAME as innerEndProductName, BPORGREGION_CCODE as regionCode, PROFITCENTER_RUS_CCODE as profitCenterCode, TOTALLABORVALUE_CNT as totalLaborCnt, TOTALBPIEPQUANTITY_CNT as totalBpiepQuantityCnt, UNITCOSTVALUE_USD_AMT as unitCostUsdSum, UNITCOSTVALUE_RUR_AMT as unitCostRurSum, TOTALCOSTVALUE_USD_AMT as totalUsdSum, TOTALCOSTVALUE_RUR_AMT as totalRurSum FROM TABLE (pkg_unitcost_api.get_UC_report1 ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId}, p_DirectionIDs => #{directionIds} ))

SELECT DIRECTION_NAME as directionName, PRDTYPE_NAME as calcType, VALUE_DAY as calcDate, BPINNERENDPRODUCT_CCODE as innerEndProductCode, BPINNERENDPRODUCT_NAME as innerEndProductName, BPORGREGION_CCODE as regionCode, PROFITCENTER_RUS_CCODE as profitCenterCode, TOTALLABORVALUE_CNT as totalLaborCnt, TOTALBPIEPQUANTITY_CNT as totalBpiepQuantityCnt, UNITCOSTVALUE_USD_AMT as unitCostUsdSum, UNITCOSTVALUE_RUR_AMT as unitCostRurSum, TOTALCOSTVALUE_USD_AMT as totalUsdSum, TOTALCOSTVALUE_RUR_AMT as totalRurSum FROM TABLE (pkg_unitcost_api.get_UC_report2 ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_CalcTypeID => #{calcTypeId}, p_DirectionIDs => #{directionIds} ))

SELECT PRDTYPE_CCODE as prdtypeCcode , lvl as lvl , value_day as valueDay , BPINNERENDPRODUCT_NAME as bpinnerendproductName , BPINNERENDPRODUCT_CCODE as bpinnerendproductCcode , BPORGREGION_CCODE as bporgregionCcode , BPDIVISIONGROUP_IEP_CCODE as bpdivisiongroupIepCcode , TOTALBPIEPQUANTITY_CNT as totalbpiepquantityCnt , TOTALLABORVALUE_CNT as totallaborvalueCnt , TOTALCOSTUSD_CNT as totalcostusdCnt , TOTALCOSTRUR_CNT as totalcostrurCnt , UC_USD as ucUsd , UC_RUR as ucRur FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_Unit_Cost ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} ))

SELECT VALUE_DAY valueDay , CCODE ccode , RUS_CCODE rusCcode , NCODE_PL ncodePl , NAME_PL namePl , NCODE_GR ncodeGr , NAME_GR nameGr , SUM_RUR_AMT sumRurAmt , SUM_USD_AMT sumUsdAmt FROM TABLE (pkg_uc_api.get_PL ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} ))

SELECT VALUE_DAY valueDay ,PROFITCENTER_RUS_CCODE profitcenterRusCcode ,BPORGREGION_COST_CCODE bporgregionCostCcode ,TOTALCOSTVALUEPC_USD_AMT2 totalcostvaluepcUsdAmt2 ,BPDIVISIONGROUP_IEP_CCODE bpdivisiongroupIepCcode ,BPINNERENDPRODUCT_NAME bpinnerendproductName ,BPINNERENDPRODUCT_CCODE bpinnerendproductCcode ,BPORGREGION_LVL4_CCODE bporgregionlvl4ccode ,BPORGREGION_LVL3_CCODE bporgregionlvl3ccode ,BPORGREGION_LVL2_CCODE bporgregionlvl2ccode ,BPORGREGION_LVL1_CCODE bporgregionlvl1ccode ,TOTALBPIEPQUANTITY_CNT totalbpiepquantitycnt ,TOTALLABORVALUE_CNT totallaborvaluecnt ,normativ normativ ,TOTALLABORVALUEPC_CNT totallaborvaluepccnt ,IEP2WORKLOAD_RATE iep2workloadrate ,TOTALCOSTVALUE_USD_AMT totalcostvalueusdamt ,TOTALCOSTVALUE_RUR_AMT totalcostvalueruramt ,TOTALCOSTVALUEPC_USD_AMT totalcostvaluepcusdamt ,TOTALCOSTVALUEPC_RUR_AMT totalcostvaluepcruramt FROM TABLE(pkg_uc_api.get_DETAILREPORT_UC ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} ))

SELECT NCODE_PL ncodepl ,name_PL namepl ,NCODE_upc ncodeupc ,name_upc nameupc ,EFFECTIVE_FROM effectiveFrom ,EFFECTIVE_TO effectiveTo FROM TABLE(pkg_uc_api.get_BPUCPLRPTSTRING_SHIST ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} ))

SELECT PC pc , START_DATE_1 startDate1 , PC_1 pc1 , START_DATE_2 startDate2 , NCODE_UPC ncodeupc , NAME_UPC nameupc , CCODE ccode , name name , RUR_AMT ruramt , USD_AMT usdamt , BPDRIVERALLOC_FACTOR bpdriverallocFactor , CORR_VALUE_DAY corrValueDay , EFFECTIVE_FROM effectiveFrom , EFFECTIVE_TO effectiveTo FROM TABLE(pkg_uc_api.get_bpplallocrules_shist ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} ))

SELECT PC pc , START_DATE startDate , ccode_pc ccodepc , KP kp , CCODE_reg ccodereg , NAME_reg namereg , ccode_dr ccodedr , name_dr namedr , HEADCOUNT_AMT headcountAmt , EFFECTIVE_FROM effectiveFrom , EFFECTIVE_TO effectiveTo FROM TABLE(pkg_uc_api.get_BPIEP2PROFITCENTER_SHIST ( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} ))
SELECT busnDate, codeCurr, rateCurr FROM TABLE(dmpr.pkg_uc_api.get_UC_currency( p_DateFrom => #{startDate}, p_DateTo => #{endDate} )) ORDER BY busnDate
